content.rendered:
Our residential title experts provide closing and refinancing services for:

  • Real estate broker
  • Real estate agent
  • Lender
  • Mortgage company
  • Mortgage broker
  • Builder
  • Developer
  • Attorney

We pledge to meet the requirements of each unique transaction, according to the expectations of all parties involved. From detailed title research to facilitated closing, you can rely on our local expertise and industry-wide knowledge to help you close on time, every time.

As part of our commitment to outstanding service, we provide a personalized approach to each title transaction and access to a variety of resources and tools. These user-friendly applications are designed to help individuals educate themselves on available options, and identify areas of concern.

The Communities We Serve

Allegiance Title serves the entire state of Texas, with team members licensed in multiple counties and through strategic partnerships across the state. We serve communities in the 254 counties across Texas. For a list of all Texas Counties Recording Fees, click here.

Continuing Education

We are dedicated to improving our professional relationships and enriching our local communities. Along with personalized care and outstanding service, we also offer real estate education courses. These courses, taught by our CEO, Dawn Enoch Moore, help local real estate professionals stay current with their industry certification.

Please visit our events and education page for more information about our real estate education courses and sign up today for the next event.
